atomica.objects
Class Molecule

java.lang.Object
  atomica.objects.Molecule

public class Molecule
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents molecules made up by atoms. Atoms have to be arranged as a rectangle on the game board not containing empty fields in the middle. Only atoms with the same color can build a valid molecule object.

Author:
Georg Ludewig
